Author: g-corr
Text: when I was first attempting to recover, my mom told all my relatives before a gathering to not mention anything related to my appearance to try to shield me from this type of bs. the first thing my grandpa did was wrap his fingers around my upper arm (literally the same body check in that movie To The Bone) and say- “ah healing up nicely”.

Author: common_potato
Text: People are so dense, I seriously wonder sometimes what goes on in the heads of relatives who make comments like that.  Honestly, your face probably looks puffy from purging - no way it's actual fat from keeping down only a snack. Please take care of yourself, your body needs that tiny bit of nourishment!
